Name: II Prinsen
Review Text:
This place changed recently, it's still a typical Amsterdam café brun, but now they serve wines, natural wines. 2 sparkling, 3 whites, 3 reds and one orange
Some good wine makers are here, I had a nice Trousseau du Jura …

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Got two beers here during a beautiful day in Amsterdam. They gave us snacks along with our beers, some nuts and pretzels. I think they were free, but they didn’t show what we paid for on the receipt. The beers were very good but slightly pricey. Very good location on the canal to people watch

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Good place slightly away from the bustle of the tourist center of Amsterdam that lets you semi-pretentiously enjoy beers served in dainty goblets right next to one of the many canals. For a velvety and flavorful ale that makes you beg for more, try the Gouveneur Dubbel.

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Simple cafe, fast nice service and the location is excellent! With outdoor seating . The apple-cake was good and a good size portion

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text:
Right on the canal..Beautiful location
..Good selection of beers...Swig away as you watch the boats pass by

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: We had a great time here, the bartender is really friendly, will cone back again soon

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: My wife and I spent a great hour or two sipping beers in front of this cozy cafe/bar.  The location is fantastic and the outdoor seating is well positioned to see the canals and to people watch.  Great beer, too (I don't think they even had …

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Really cozy bar with friendly service and free wifi. The wood paneled interior is truly beautiful and very inviting. Expect more Dutch people and less rowdy tourists than other bars in the area. It's a wonderful spot to sit outside along the canal.

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: The coziest of places for your delicious Dutch apple pie & coffee break! A small corner café along one of the canals, we were served be the friendliest guy ever! The place is cozy and clean, with a view! The delicious pie menu includes a coffee and homemade whipped cream...worth a stop!

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: My favourite Brown Cafe in Amsterdam. Warm wood paneling, candles on the tables and a good selection of drinks. Very cozy for drinks with a friend, or just on your own. Locals are mostly here too, so it's a nice escape from the tourists everywhere.

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Lovely spot! My husband and I stopped off on Saturday for just a quick drink and ended up staying a good couple of hours. Lovely place with great service.

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Great atmosphere great waiters really both of them are super!! Understated but v v happy place! Great music repositery!! And... fresh flowers everyday! Fab ... could do w a bit more finger food options :-(

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Stopped here for a decent coffee and very nice piece of apple pie. Perfect to warm up and rest the legs for 20 minutes before hitting the streets again.

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text:
we had a great night here with very good music
congrats to the  barkeeper Jan-Willem who had everything under control including the provisioning :-) …

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Really nice place, if i am going to dinner around that area, i always come here for a drink & to read, or a start beer with friends. Also good music.

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Very cozy bar with good beer selection and view of the canal, great place to catch your breath and relax while city exploring!

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: A wonderful little one man cafe/bar with a personal touch. Reasonably priced and good food with a friendly bar man to match.

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Great Negronis

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Tried a new beer as recommended by the barman and enjoyed my evening greatly. Friendly bar staff and good atmpsphere.

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text:
Nice atmosphere,

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Cozy cafe with friendly staff and a selection of beers on draft or in a bottle. Definitely worth a visit.

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: An old-style cosy bar. A bit on the noisy side but still a good place to sit down for a beer with friends.

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Great spot on the canal with assortment of local Pilsner styles on tap and the odd hoppy brew. Friendly crew.

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Bartender: excellent. Cappuccino: served on a nice tray. Chill music. Good place.

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text:
I orderd the carpachio sandwich and  got only two thin pieces of bread and about 15 grams of meat in between them.
that costed me 9 euros.

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Half of the menu is missing... Takes very long to get food. But a nice beer selection!

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text:
I ordered a sandwich. i received 2 picecs of bread and cheese
this cost 8.5 euro
I orderd a 7up. i recived 200 mil of 7up. this cost 2.euro
bad bad bad

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Such a great place with a lovely atmosphere and friendly personnel! I would absolutely recommend :)

Review Text: Small as every pub in the area but superb service

Name: II Prinsen

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Fantastic place. Good beer and welcoming staff. A must to visit.

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Nice place with good atmosphere and outdoor seating on the canal. Better than average apple cake.

Name: II Prinsen
Review Text: Lovely cosy cafe bar with super friendly service. Well worth a visit.
